selected_quotes: Australia is failing new parents with conflicting advice – it's urgent we get it right
New parents are already anxious and sleep-deprived conflicting advice on infant care from doesn't help
Australia's failing new parents with conflicting advice. #UQ Dr Pamela Douglas explains on @ConversationEDU
new parents conflicting advice - my PhD into role of GP. 24yrs later challenge continues
We must take primary care research seriously Urgent call fromDr Douglas to improve infant health @AAAPC_ANZ @RACGP

citation.abstract: From the moment their baby is born, Australian parents receive conflicting advice on how to cope with newborn issues. What we are doing wastes our resources, but we're not investing in alternatives.
citation.title: Essays on health: Australia is failing new parents with conflicting advice - it's urgent we get it right

news.title: Australia is failing new parents with conflicting advice
news.summary: Posted September 12, 2017 07:32:05 Every year, hundreds of thousands of Australians embark on a disorienting, life-changing journey: they have a baby.

facebook.title: Essays on health: Australia is failing new parents with conflicting advice - it's urgent we get it right
facebook.summary:
Much of the baby's distress, as well as that of the parents, can be prevented. Janko Ferlič/Unsplash
Every year, hundreds of thousands of Australians embark on a disorienting, life changing journey. They have a baby.

What happens after a woman gives birth

facebook.title: Essays on health: Australia is failing new parents with conflicting advice - it's urgent we get it right
facebook.summary:
So much of a baby’s distress, as well as that of its parents, can be prevented. 

Why? Because our health professionals often recommend approaches to behaviour problems in infants - such as with breastfeeding, crying and fussing, or sleep - that have been

Intersting via The Conversation 

From the moment their baby is born, Australian parents receive vastly conflicting advice from different health disciplines, or even from different health professionals in the one discipline. Confusion during an already cha

facebook.title: Essays on health: Australia is failing new parents with conflicting advice – it's urgent we get it right
facebook.summary:
We need more investment in primary health care services so we can provide new parents with quick, accurate and consistent information and advice. 

http://bit.ly/2h2gINN
